channel.description: The top News headlines from The Sydney Morning Herald. For all the news, visit https://www.smh.com.au
channel.title: Sydney Morning Herald - Latest News

item.dc:creator: Adam Pengilly
item.description: The Roosters and Raiders clash for the first time since the sides met in the controversial 2019 grand final.
item.title: NRL 2020 LIVE updates: Roosters take on Raiders in grand final replay

item.dc:creator: Damien Ractliffe
item.description: Hasn't football got interesting? Leading Victorian clubs Geelong and Collingwood are going head-to-head in Perth.
item.title: AFL round seven LIVE: Geelong v Collingwood

item.dc:creator: David Estcourt
item.description: A Melbourne teacher accused of masquerading online as a 13-year-old girl to encourage students to send him nude images and child abuse material has been granted bail.
item.title: Bail for teacher accused of luring children into sending sexual images

item.dc:creator: Matt Dennien
item.description: Burnett MP Stephen Bennett submitted an update on Thursday as part of months-long efforts to update his details after being made a director of his son's company.
item.title: LNP frontbencher apologises for failing to 'fully' update interests

item.dc:creator: Matt Bungard
item.description: Insurance giant Medibank will pay $5 million in penalties for violating Australian Consumer Law after nearly 1400 claims from its ahm customers were incorrectly rejected.
item.title: Medibank fined $5 million for misrepresenting benefit claims

item.dc:creator: Melissa Cunningham
item.description: Some elective surgery patients are being urged to consider delaying their procedures for up to a year if they can safely do so as COVID-19 outbreaks continue to hit Melbourne hospitals.
item.title: IVF sector in limbo as public hospitals hit pause on some elective surgery

item.dc:creator: Noel Towell
item.description: The state's Chief Health Officer sees positive signs in the infections data, but clusters are growing at nursing homes and other healthcare sites.
item.title: 150 Victorian health workers infected as new cases top 300

item.dc:creator: Rachael Dexter
item.description: Globally there have been more than 13.4 million confirmed COVID-19 cases and more than 580,000 deaths.
item.title: Coronavirus updates LIVE: Victoria records 317 new COVID-19 cases as Crossroads Hotel cluster grows in NSW; Australian death toll stands at 113

item.dc:creator: Andrew Webster
item.description: Talks have been held with the Bulldogs on Jones' behalf, but he's more likely to come to the NRL after the next Rugby World Cup.
item.title: 'I'm focused on England': Jones won't be scratching league itch before 2023

item.description: Your complete guide to the eight-race program at Taree.
item.title: Race-by-race guide and tips for Taree on Friday

item.dc:creator: Garry Maddox
item.description: After the Mukbang drama, the rising actress stars in new Australian film Babyteeth.
item.title: Eliza Scanlen in the spotlight again in a 'delightfully bent love story'

item.dc:creator: Jake Niall
item.description: The Gold Coast has long been known as the place where professional sporting teams go to die. Today, amid a pandemic, it is the region that is helping keep the AFL alive.
item.title: Operation payback: How Queensland has bailed out Victorian clubs

item.description: The finest photos from the international wire agencies as chosen by our picture editors.
item.title: The best of the world in pictures

item.description: The best photos from the international wire agencies as chosen by our picture editors
item.title: Gallery: The best photos from around the world

item.description: The best photos from the international wire agencies as chosen by our picture editors
item.title: Gallery: The best photos from around the world

item.dc:creator: Jewel Topsfield
item.description: New data released by the Council to Homeless Persons reveals almost 2000 homeless people - including more than 220 children - are still in hotels across metropolitan Melbourne without any certainty about long term housing.
item.title: Colin Johnstone finds a home but fears remain for 2000 hotel homeless

item.dc:creator: Michael Chammas
item.description: Kieran Foran has been one of the highest paid players in the NRL the past three years, but that's about to change.
item.title: Bulldogs offer Foran one-year deal as he weighs up 75 per cent pay cut

item.dc:creator: Angus Thompson
item.description: The main thoroughfare leading to one of Sydney's most popular beaches could be closed off to traffic for a pop-up entertainment precinct under a creative proposal.
item.title: Coogee's main street could oust traffic for entertainment

item.description: The art stunt was a meticulously planned dawn operation, but many are questioning the wealthy London artist's motives.
item.title: Backlash as white ‘guerilla’ artist secretly installs black lives matters statue

item.description: All the ins and outs for round seven of the AFL season, and our experts' tips for the round.
item.title: AFL teams and expert tips, round seven

item.dc:creator: Sally Rawsthorne
item.description: A cadaver dog unearthed the bones, which have been determined to be those of a human, on Wednesday as officers searched for missing NSW North Coast woman Thea Liddle.
item.title: 'Highly unlikely' that Byron bones are those of backpacker Theo Hayez: police

item.dc:creator: Matt Dennien
item.description: Changes to the regulation of the popular toys was flagged in February, amid growing concerns from police about their misuse.
item.title: Queensland government cracks down on gel blasters

item.dc:creator: Bianca Hall
item.description: The City of Melbourne and the state government have filed proceedings against the developers who demolished the Carlton pub, after they failed to comply with an order that they transform the site into a park.
item.title: Contempt of court proceedings launched against Corkman Pub owners

item.dc:creator: Daniel Cherny
item.description: The Western Bulldogs have again lost patience with Josh Schache, dropping him after a two-disposal showing against Carlton last Sunday night.
item.title: Schache dumped again after two disposal showing

item.dc:creator: Rachel Eddie
item.description: Deputy lord mayor Arron Wood will next week push for the state government to drop cohealth in Victoria Street as a possible site, in a motion seconded by lord mayor Sally Capp.
item.title: Council to consider bid to veto second injecting room site

item.dc:creator: Mike Foley
item.description: A report into a controversial government water buyback scheme found value for taxpayers' money wasn't ensured, but did not find any legal breaches.
item.title: Auditor-General 'watergate' report finds buyback scheme didn't ensure value

item.dc:creator: Andrew Wu
item.description: Sydney defender Aliir Aliir has been handed an instant reprieve as the Swans found respite to their tall timber woes for Saturday's match against the Suns.
item.title: Undermanned Swans recall Aliir for Gold Coast clash

item.dc:creator: Zoe Samios
item.description: Internet service providers are worried that broadband services will suffer if the extra bandwidth is removed from the table in August.
item.title: Telcos push NBN Co for bandwidth extension

item.description: "If Joe Biden drops out and the DNC runs a tomato can, I will vote for the tomato can, because I believe the tomato can will do less harm than our current President."
item.title: 'It's OK to change your mind': Trump voters join 'Never Trump' ranks

item.description: What few people know is that in 1977, 23-year-old Travolta lost his first love to the same disease that would later claim his wife, Kelly Preston.
item.title: John Travolta and the tragedy of loss that surrounds him

item.dc:creator: Daile Cross
item.description: On arrival at the airport the woman was issued with a self-quarantine direction as per border rules, requiring her to isolate within her home for 14 days.
item.title: WA woman charged after flying in from Victoria, breaching quarantine to attend party

item.dc:creator: Vince Rugari
item.description: The reigning GWS best-and-fairest winner played like a "man possessed" in a scratch match last weekend and is ready for the AFL, coach Leon Cameron says.
item.title: 'A man possessed': Taranto back as Cameron tweaks 'beaten-up' Giants midfield

item.dc:creator: Roy Ward
item.description: Channel Seven will keep their traditional game slots and Fox Footy will be taking on the extra midweek games when the AFL accelerates its fixture.
item.title: Channel Seven keeps regular AFL slots, midweek for Fox Footy in condensed fixture

item.description: Astrology devotees are in uproar after a NASA website for kids about zodiac constellations gained traction on social media worldwide, throwing doubt on their star sign beliefs.
item.title: 'Thirteenth constellation' rewrites the stars

item.dc:creator: Anna Patty
item.description: NSW has agreed to match the Commonwealth's $500 million for skills training with its proportional share of funding as TAFE makes plans to commercialise its services.
item.title: NSW seeks new vocational training options for school students

item.dc:creator: Tammy Mills
item.description: The bank is facing a class action over allegations it gave kick-backs to car dealers to sting customers with high interest loans.
item.title: Westpac faces class action over high interest car loans

item.dc:creator: Matt Dennien
item.description: The state's unemployment rate dropped slightly to 7.7 per cent in June, after surging from 5.6 per cent in the first two months of the year before COVID-19 hit.
item.title: Queensland bucks unemployment rate rise with more still out of work

item.dc:creator: Christian Nicolussi
item.description: Steve Morris knows he hung around at the Roosters one year too long, but has backed twins Brett and Josh to play on in 2021 – and the Roosters will accommodate them.
item.title: 'They really are incredible': Dad backs Morris twins to play on in 2021

item.dc:creator: Roy Ward
item.description: Victorian-raised Brisbane midfielder Jarrod Berry has dismissed claims clubs are facing too much disadvantage by having to move to Queensland due to COVID-19.
item.title: 'Do you want footy to keep going or not?' Victorian-raised Lion speaks up for Queensland

item.dc:creator: Zoe Samios
item.description: Australia's biggest phone company will not leave the Hong Kong market as it does not anticipate the new security laws will apply to its business there.
item.title: Telstra to stay in Hong Kong ‘anticipating’ it won't be asked for data

item.description: It's too easy to miss brilliant streaming shows, movies and documentaries. Here are the ones to hit play on or skip.
item.title: 'An unrecognisable beast': 1980s classic Valley Girl gets a reboot

item.dc:creator: Laura Chung
item.description: Rob Rogers had his appointment extended indefinitely on Thursday despite the NSW Bushfire Inquiry and the Royal Commission into National Natural Disaster Arrangements having yet to release their findings.
item.title: Fire chief lays out his priorities for next summer

item.description: Follow news and events as they happen.
item.title: Tablet interactive: Coronavirus outbreak

item.dc:creator: Dana McCauley
item.description: Winemaker Chris Carpenter has broken ranks with alcohol industry lobbyists to back a proposed new pregnancy warning label for alcohol bottles, as politicians prepare to vote on the hotly contested issue.
item.title: Winemaker backs tough new pregnancy warning label ahead of tight vote

item.dc:creator: Andrew Wu
item.description: Selector Trevor Hohns has been given another year on his contract, as Cricket Australia enters a crucial phase in the bid to save the limited-overs tour of England.
item.title: 'Critical period': Hohns stays on, CA 'hopeful' on England tour

item.dc:creator: Nick Bonyhady
item.description: A national small business body has warned the cost of workers' leave balances could put struggling businesses under, as Qantas tries to reduce its holiday bill.
item.title: Qantas asks pilots to go without leave to avoid forced redundancies

item.dc:creator: Tom Cowie
item.description: The notorious 'Boulie Tacker', who has evaded capture for years after dropping thousands of furniture tacks on Yarra Boulevard in Kew, has returned despite police efforts.
item.title: Return of the tack: 'Pretty sick' Boulie Tacker is back targeting cyclists

item.dc:creator: The Herald's View
item.description: The economic news is grim but the political agreement on economic policy is encouraging.
item.title: Jobs news should strengthen consensus on stimulus

item.dc:creator: Adam Cooper
item.description: A Melbourne teenager who wagged school and stabbed his own grandfather 24 times before heading back to class has been sentenced to 16 years in custody.
item.title: 'He was a bit of a creep': Teen who murdered grandfather gets 16 years

item.dc:creator: Toby Crockford
item.description: State Member for Cook Cynthia Lui is the first Torres Strait Islander to be voted into any Australian parliament.
item.title: First Torres Strait Islander MP introduces 'historic' Bill to Queensland Parliament
